', u'"Rinth Island is a game that every puzzle and adventure fan should be playing." \u2014 Slide To Play, 4/4', u'"The concept is a very good one, and the ability to play levels created by other people is the icing on the cake." \u2014 148Apps, 4/5', u'"It has lots of game modes which make it playable for many, many times and the puzzles are vast and imaginative." \u2014 App-Score, 8/10', u'"Equipped with a level of depth, breadth of content and good design sense that completely defy its price range, Rinth is a clear must-have for puzzle fans of every stripe." \u2014 iFanzine, 4.5/5', u'"Rinth Island is uber-cool and is easily one of the best 3D platformers on the app store so far!" \u2014 AppCroc', u'"Simply put, Rinth Island blew us out of the water." \u2014 Gamezebo, 4.5/5', u'"Don\u2019t hesitate to grab this challenging little gem: Rinth Island is a fantastic title with a ton of replay value." \u2014 AppTudes, 4/5', u"Embark on an incredible adventure on the mysterious Rinth Island. Featuring unique puzzles, gorgeous visuals, a deep story, and loveable characters, Rinth Island is an adventure you simply can't afford to miss. ", u'\u2022 UNIQUE GAMEPLAY', u'Travel around the 3D island to find the right path to the goal in each level. Climb ladders, drop from platforms and push crates around at the touch of one finger. ', u'\u2022 BEAUTIFUL VISUALS', u"Rinth Island features stunning 3D environments, set in a beautiful desert island world. Every aspect of Rinth Island impresses in it's style and beauty. ", u'\u2022 CLASSIC ADVENTURE', u'A storm has left our intrepid heroes stranded on the island, now  they must set out on an adventure of a lifetime. Featuring 60 levels, with four ways to play each one, this is one seriously epic adventure. ', u'\u2022 CREATE, PLAY, SHARE', u"The fun doesn't stop when the story ends, you can create your very own levels and share them with players worldwide. Your imagination is the limit, what wonders can you create? ", u'For more information or support, please visit www.chillingo.com']

Name: Fibble
Description: [u'EXPERIENCE EARTH FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE IN THE PHYSICS-BASED PUZZLER FIBBLE \u2013 FLICK \u2019N\u2019 ROLL!', u'When the cute but curiously brave extraterrestrial explorer \u2018Fibble\u2019 and his friends crash-land in a regular suburban home, the world we take for granted suddenly starts to look a lot like alien territory.', u'HELP FIBBLE TO FIND HIS FRIENDS', u'In the dramatic crash, Fibble becomes separated from his crew as they\u2019re scattered all over the mysterious house. Combine the unique skills of Fibble\u2019s friends and discover all sorts of new possibilities: Overcome obstacles with some help from Byte, scale new heights with Ragno and inject some speed into proceedings with a boost from Vroom or Docto.', u'INTUITIVE TAP CONTROLS FOR FAST-PACED FUN', u'Use intuitive taps of the touch screen to flick, roll and control Fibble as he embarks on an adventure to reassemble his crew and blast back into space.', u'30 EXCITING LEVELS IN 4 UNIQUE LIVING SPACES', u'Discover the bright and colorful world of \u2018Fibble \u2013 Flick \u2018n\u2019 Roll\u2019 with its ambitious courses set in 4 distinct rooms ranging from the kitchen, to the bathroom, to the kid\u2019s room and to the basement. Solve each Puzzle with a combination of logic, skill and reflexes.', u'VIBRANT GRAPHICS', u'Experience high-definition gaming like never before supported by top-notch features completely new to the mobile experience.', u'HIGH QUALITY REAL TIME 3D CINEMATICS', u'Learn more about Fibble\u2019s dramatic adventure with his adorably cute crew in high-quality realtime 3D cinematics in \u2019Fibble \u2013 Flick \u2019n\u2019 Roll\u2019.', u'CHALLENGING PHYSICS-BASED GAMEPLAY AND HOURS OF REPLAY VALUE.', u'Enjoy a groundbreaking gameplay experience that is highly addictive and guarantees many hours of sheer fun.', u'BECOME THE ULTIMATE MASTER OF THE GAME', u'Along the way there are achievements to bag, objectives to complete and online scoreboards to climb\u2014all of which will keep you coming back for more!', u'Become a fan of Fibble on Facebook', u'http://www.facebook.com/fibblegame', u'Follow Fibble on Twitter', u'http://twitter.com/#!/fibblegame', u'See Fibble in action on YouTube', u'http://www.youtube.com/user/fibblegame']

Name: Fibble HD
Description: [u'NOW WITH BRAND NEW PLACES AND FACES - DISCOVER FRESH LEVELS AND MEET KLONK!', u'EXPERIENCE EARTH FROM A WHOLE NEW PERSPECTIVE IN THE PHYSICS-BASED PUZZLER FIBBLE \u2013 FLICK \u2019N\u2019 ROLL!', u'When the cute but curiously brave extraterrestrial explorer \u2018Fibble\u2019 and his friends crash-land in a regular suburban home, the world we take for granted suddenly starts to look a lot like alien territory. ', u'HELP FIBBLE TO FIND HIS FRIENDS ', u'In the dramatic crash, Fibble becomes separated from his crew as they\u2019re scattered all over the mysterious house. Combine the unique skills of Fibble\u2019s friends and discover all sorts of new possibilities: Overcome obstacles with some help from Byte, scale new heights with Ragno and inject some speed into proceedings with a boost from Vroom or Docto. ', u'INTUITIVE TAP CONTROLS FOR FAST-PACED FUN', u'Use intuitive taps of the touch screen to flick, roll and control Fibble as he embarks on an adventure to reassemble his crew and blast back into space.', u'OVER 40 EXCITING LEVELS IN 5 UNIQUE AREAS', u'Discover the bright and colorful world of Fibble \u2013 Flick \u2018n\u2019 Roll, with ambitious courses spread across 5 distinct areas! Roll through the kitchen, bathroom, kid\u2019s room and basement, as well as the brand new garden area. And with the Lost Files Part 1 you can unlock even more puzzling levels to test your logic, skill and reflexes! ', u'VIBRANT, CRYTEK CONSOLE QUALITY 3D GRAPHICS ', u'Experience high-definition gaming like never before supported by top-notch features completely new to the mobile experience powered by CryENGINE.', u'HIGH QUALITY REAL TIME 3D CINEMATICS', u'Learn more about Fibble\u2019s dramatic adventure with his adorably cute crew in high-quality realtime 3D cinematics in \u2019Fibble \u2013 Flick \u2019n\u2019 Roll\u2019.', u'CHALLENGING PHYSICS-BASED GAMEPLAY AND HOURS OF REPLAY VALUE.', u'Enjoy a groundbreaking gameplay experience that is highly addictive and guarantees many hours of sheer fun.', u'BECOME THE ULTIMATE MASTER OF THE GAME', u'Along the way there are achievements to bag, objectives to complete and online scoreboards to climb\u2014all of which will keep you coming back for more! ', u'Become a fan of Fibble on Facebook', u'http://www.facebook.com/fibblegame', u'Follow Fibble on Twitter', u'http://twitter.com/#!/fibblegame', u'See Fibble in action on YouTube ', u'http://www.youtube.com/user/fibblegame']

Name: Dirt Bike Madness ( 3D Car Racing Games )
Description: [u'Go ahead  and live out your motorbike racing dreams with Dirt Bike Madness!!!', u'Ride your dirt bike on unusually challenging obstacle courses and try to complete all the levels, in this adrenaline  action-packed, heart-thumping bike game.', u'Features: ', u'-Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking behavior to the bike and rider. ', u'-Unique and smooth gameplay ', u'-30 exciting and hard levels ', u'-6 different terrains/location ', u'-Accelerometer support ', u'-Earn stars for your best local times.']

Name: Where's My Wings
Description: [u'\U0001f380\U0001f380\U0001f380Over 20 Million Players! Join in! \U0001f380\U0001f380\U0001f380', u'\U0001f61dYou have always dreamed of flying - but where\u2019s your wings?', u'\U0001f61dLuckily the world is full of beautiful hills. ', u'\U0001f61dUse the hills as jumps - slide down, flap your wings and fly! ', u'\U0001f61dAt least for a moment - until this annoying gravity brings you back down to earth. ', u'\U0001f61dBut the next hill is waiting for you already. ', u'\U0001f61dOtherwise flying will only be a dream once again.', u'\U0001f37aGet ready to blast off on an epic flying journey with your wings! \U0001f37a', u'\U0001f3c6\U0001f3c6\U0001f3c6Highlights: \U0001f3c6\U0001f3c6\U0001f3c6', u'\U0001f340Eye-popping cartoon graphics and beautiful multi-layered backdrops', u'\U0001f34030 magical worlds to explore!', u'\U0001f340Simple but skillfull "one button" (ok... maybe "one touch") arcade game about the dream of flying', u'\U0001f340 Unlock all kinds of new characters to play with!', u'What are you waiting for? Grab Where\u2019s My Wings and start flying!']

Name: Amoebattle
Description: [u'The fate of our biological future lies in the palm of your hands. Real Time Strategy is reimagined for the iPad, iPhone, and iPod Touch.', u'- Featuring Retina Display Support for the new iPad -', u'THE BATTLE FOR PRIMORIDAL SOUP-REMACY', u'Lead your group of amoebas against a fast spreading infection that threatens the microscopic world. Built from the ground up for the mobile touchscreen, Amoebattle delivers a highly unique RTS experience for newcomers and veterans alike.', u'DIVE INTO THE MICROSCOPIC WORLD', u'Discover nine types of creatures, from the fast moving Viper to the indestructible Ursa. Journey through the beautiful yet alien landscapes, featuring a remarkable watercolor/pixel hybrid art style.', u'THE TIDE OF BATTLE', u'Mutate into any other amoeba to fit your playstyle or try new tactics. Turn the tide of battle with powerful Probes, such as the Cryoprobe that slows enemies to a crawl.', u'ALL THE THRILLS...', u'Stop the infection and destroy its source in the varied and intense twelve mission campaign. Show your dominance by conquering the challenging Game Center Achievements.', u'AND ALL THE FRILLS', u'Universal, iCloud Enabled, Retina Display, intuitive Multi-Touch controls, and AMI - your neighborhood friendly robotic assistant.', u'Amoebattle brings the action and excitement of the RTS to the iPad, iPhone, and iPod Touch to deliver an experience unlike anything else.']

Name: CreaVures
Description: [u"\u2605\u2605\u2605 Special 99c pricing to celebrate this gorgeous game's launch. Limited time only! \u2605\u2605\u2605", u'\u2605 Nominated for Develop Brighton Indie Showcase, Game Connection Selected Project, and IMGA Best Casual Game! \u2605', u'What the press are saying about CreaVures:', u'"I truly recommend this game to any gamer as it\u2019s fun, original and a truly amazing experience that everyone will enjoy a huge amount." \u2014 App-Score, 10/10', u'"...this is one of those platformers that you simply have to try." \u2014 AppCroc', u'"Its bioluminescent world is downright magical and levels have a wide open feel..." \u2014 iFanzine', u'"...CreaVures is another solid platformer under the Chillingo umbrella, full of puzzles, bosses, and some beautiful cut scenes." \u2014 AppTudes, 4/5', u'Once alive with light, the forest is now almost choked by darkness. Only five little CreaVures, mystical beings possessing great bravery, can pull back the blanket of night and restore the forest to its luminescent grandeur.', u'\u2022 FIVE FOR FIGHTING', u'Each of the five CreaVures \u2013 Bitey, Pokey, Rolly, Zappy, and Glidey - has a unique talent suited for solving special puzzles and surviving tough enemies, including terrifying boss battles at the end of each chapter. Only by working together can the CreaVures restore their forest home.', u'\u2022 HAUNTINGLY BEAUTIFUL', u'Bathed in fluorescent highlights, the world of CreaVures is a dreamscape made real. Tree rings glow in the gloom. Swirls of light rise from twinkling flower petals. CreaVure eyes pulse in the twilight. This is one game you cannot tear your eyes away from.', u'\u2022 FUN AND FANTASY AWAIT', u'CreaVures\u2019s puzzle-filled platforming is enhanced by fantastical story that pulls you into its world and compels you to keep playing until the forest is rescued from oppressive darkness.']

Name: iOOTP Baseball 2012 Edition
Description: [u'Out of the Park Baseball, the most realistic and best-selling baseball management game ever created, is available for iOS as a brand new 2012 version!', u'"With a great menu system driving the entire game, excellent AI, and the ability to micro-manage almost everything you could dream of in a sports game, it\'s hard to want anything else of a mobile baseball management sim." (Touch Arcade)', u'"iOOTP is so addicting that a surgeon general\'s warning should accompany its download." - 8.5/10 Great! (Operationsports.com)', u'"There is really no other iPhone baseball game that is like iOOTP." - 5 Stars! (iPhoneGamerBlog.com)', u'"iOOTP Baseball is a no-brainer for iPhone-owning baseball fans. This is easily the best text-based sports sim available for the iOS platform." (Examiner.com)', u'PLEASE NOTE: The iPhone 3G / iPod Touch 2nd gen or older are NOT supported!', u'New features in iOOTP Baseball this year:', u'- Real 2012 rosters! Every player on every major league team is available, along with the top 10 minor league prospects for each team.', u'- Detailed player histories are kept and there are more leaderboards.', u'- Historical seasons now feature real schedules.', u'- Includes one new fictional setup, along with the ability to choose any year to start your fictional league, complete with stats and finances from that era.', u'- While managing a game, you can opt to use pitch-by-pitch mode, and you can sim until a specific inning. You can also change game options during a sim.', u'- Modify league rules and names (DH-rule, finances etc.) ', u'- Easier file transfer via iTunes Share', u'- We improved the AI throughout the game and also enhanced the unser interface.', u'- Universal build, the iPad HD version is included for free!', u'iOOTP Baseball 2012 features a living world that uses the same robust simulation engine found in Out of the Park Baseball for Mac and PC, the best-selling and best-rated baseball management game of all time. Out of the Park Baseball is the second-highest-rated PC game ever on Metacritic and also received the PC Gamer Sports Game of the Year Award.', u'The game offers three gameplay modes:', u'- Major Leagues: Choose a team and play out the 2012 season. Will Yu Darwish dominate? When will Bryce Harper debut? Find out!', u'- Fictional: iOOTP creates one of four fictional baseball worlds and populates it with fresh players and clubs. Select a team and build a dynasty from scratch.', u'- Historical Replay: Choose one of three past seasons -- 1924, 1969, or 2004 -- and see if it produces a different outcome. Every other year in history is available as in-app purchase!', u'After selecting a gameplay mode, choose a team and handle every aspect of managing it:', u'- Manage your team, set lineups, depth charts, pitching staff and more!', u'- Call the shots from the dugout and watch the games unfold.', u'- Step into the shoes of the General Manager: Negotiate contracts, sign free agents, put together trades, draft amateurs, promote players from the minors etc.', u"During games, the play-by-play text is generated from a huge database of tens of thousands of lines that bring the action alive. Bottom of the ninth, two outs, bases loaded, you're down by two runs and you have your best hitter stepping to the plate against your opponent's rock-solid closer ... What will happen next?", u'During the season, news tickers bring you headlines from around the leagues! Your biggest rival just pulled off a blockbuster trade with the trading deadline looming ... How will you respond?', u"As iOOTP's living world evolves, players develop their careers, age, and eventually retire, with a possible spot in the Hall of Fame waiting for them. New players drafted by you and groomed in the minors take their place and become the next generation of superstars.", u'iOOTP Baseball is the ultimate game for baseball fans!', u'Visit us on www.ootpdevelopments.com!', u'Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ootpbaseball', u'Twitter: http://twitter.com/ootpbaseball']

Name: Rogue Ninja
Description: [u'\u2605\u2605\u2605 Release Event! Sale 2.99$->0.99$ \u2605\u2605\u2605', u'### Rogue like RPG Game! ###', u'*Random Dungeons!', u'*Many items and monsters!', u'*Retro style pixel art and chiptune music!', u'*Japanese Ninja world!']

Name: Texas Poker VIP
Description: [u'A 3-Day only sale, from $14.99 to $0.99! Don\u2019t miss it, get Texas Poker VIP today! ', u'We introduce Texas Poker VIP \u2013 your invitation card to the VIP social poker club! ', u'Join the golden VIP poker crowd and get all the cool EXCLUSIVE benefits! ', u'VIP BONUSES AND DEALS ', u'\u2660 Super deals on chip packages: 50% off for VIP users ', u'\u2660 Even more bonuses, discounts and special features FOR THE VIP MEMBERS with every update ', u"\u2660 2 in 1: Omaha Hi and Texas Hold'em Poker in one app! ", u'\u2660 Live Support 24/7. We answer in 10 mins', u'\u2660 High level of social integration with other players', u'SOCIAL REWARDS AND ENTERTAINMENT ', u'\u2660 Invite friends to your table ', u'\u2660 Send messages in public or private chat in the lobby or at the table\u2028 ', u'\u2660 Give presents and buy drinks ', u'\u2660 Use the status bar\u2028 ', u'\u2660 Talk to opponents in your native tongue (6 most popular languages available)\u2028\u2028 ', u'POKER SKILL DEVELOPMENT\u2028 ', u'\u2660 Unlock achievements ', u'\u2028\u2660 Receive experience levels ', u'\u2028\u2660 Win distinguishing signs ', u'\u2028\u2660 Share your results on Facebook \u2028\u2028 ', u'Texas Poker VIP is where a poker app meets VIP service and quality! ', u'More great features: ', u'- Detailed Texas Hold\u2019em tutorial for beginners\u2028 ', u"- Sit'n'Go tournaments ", u'- Omaha Hi ', u'- Table selection according to your preferences\u2028 ', u'- Several login options: via Facebook, Gamecenter, new account, Guest game ', u'- Account with an uploadable avatar and detailed user info ', u'- Integrated music player.']

Name: Cubis Creatures
Description: [u'\u2605 Help wake your friends by solving puzzles in this CLEVER Addictive PUZZLER. \u2605', u'REVIEWS', u'\u2605 GameZebo-4/5 Stars -\u201cCubis Creatures is a fun puzzler with plenty of personality and polish\u201d', u'\u2605 TouchArcade forums- \u201cVery well done... I\u2019m hooked....\u201d', u'\u2605 Apple-N-Apps - 4.5/5 - "Cubis finally comes to iOS, and does so in high style making it a must buy\u2026..\u201d ', u'\u2605 AppAdvice - "Cubis is a refreshing new take on your classic match-three puzzle game".', u'\u2605\u2605 Curiously CUTE characters, Fast paced action, Beautiful art and Addictive gameplay bring puzzle games to a whole new level of FUN in CUBIS Creatures! \u2605\u2605', u'Slide, Stack and Crack your way to victory! \u2013 Cubis, the #1 cube puzzler is back with lots of new and exciting features!  Bomb-away for bonuses, fire lasers to rack up score multipliers, and compete in daily tournaments to show your stuff. Completing the puzzles in each world gets you one step closer to unlocking the whimsical mystery put upon our sleeping furry friends. ', u'\u2605Think you\u2019re the top scoring Cubis player? Get ready for Cubis Daily Tournaments; it\u2019s your chance to show your mad scoring skills. Each day a new Cubis level will be queued for play, igniting a challenge to players around the world to achieve high score domination. In the future, look for real-world prizes to be awarded to ace players topping tournament leaderboards! \u2605', u'FEATURES:', u'\u2605 80 Amazing handcrafted levels', u'\u2605 4 Curiously cute characters', u'\u2605 Additional level packs available', u'\u2605 Daily \u201dCubis Tournament\u201d ', u'\u2605 Endless hours of standard single-player gameplay', u'\u2605 Awesome achievements  to unlock', u'\u2605 Customized Game Center leaderboards', u'Product Info:', u'\u2605Supports Retina display', u'\u2605Universal supports IOS 4+ iPhone, iPad. IPod', u'\u2605Customized Game Center leaderboards', u'************************** ', u'FOLLOW US FOR THE LATEST UPDATES AND NEWS. ', u'On Twitter- https://twitter.com/#!/cubiscreatures', u'On Facebook \u2013 http://www.facebook.com/CubisRemix', u'Company site- www.freshgames.com', u'Cubis Creatures video: http://tinyurl.com/7ewgrbn']

Name: Build Worlds
Description: [u'Imagine a world where you have full control. Imagine a world where your dreams become alive. This game allows you to take the hand of creation and craft your world; "Build Worlds"', u'Take flight, take combat, take blocks to new highs, new worlds.', u'** Build Worlds **', u'** Download Now **']

Name: Zombie Outbreak Simulator
Description: [u'Zombie Outbreak Simulator is a sandbox app where you customize your own zombie outbreak, on Google Maps (R).', u'"a killer timewaster" - Gizmodo', u'"zombies plus Google Maps equals fun" - Games Radar', u'"a splendid idea, no matter how omnipresent zombies may be" - Rock, Paper, Shotgun', u'Zombie Outbreak Simulator, the hit Flash title with over a million plays online, is now available on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch!', u'Watch a zombie outbreak unfold in a real world environment and alter the outbreak parameters to your liking. Do you prefer old-school slow movers, or the new fast movers? Is the population armed? How well can they shoot? Customize your own outbreak then watch the chaos unfold.', u"With new iOS exclusive features, you can now zoom in and out on the action to keep track of the infection as it spreads across the map! Watch from a high satellite view to get an overview of the infection, represented by green dots for civilians, red for zombies and blue for police. Or zoom right in and watch as civilians run for their lives, shoot at zombies and inevitably become infected. Keep track of the people's only hope - local law enforcement, as they fight back against overwhelming odds.", u'From the Outbreak Settings screen, you can change any of the following parameters:', u'- Initial zombie numbers', u'- Zombie outbreak direction (N, E, S, W, Map Wide)', u'- Infection rate (time taken for infected civs to turn into zombies)', u'- Zombie speed', u'- Number of police', u'- Police accuracy', u'- Civilian numbers', u'- Civilian armed %', u'- Civilian accuracy', u'Once you have selected your new outbreak settings, simply restart and watch the infection spread once again!', u'Note that Zombie Outbreak Simulator requires an active Internet connection so that it can download map images from Google.']

Name: DevilDark: The Fallen Kingdom
Description: [u"wage WAR against an ANCIENT EVIL and become the HERO you were BORN TO BE! the world's fate is in YOUR HANDS!", u'*Update coming soon to fix iPhone 3GS and iPad 3 display issues*', u'\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605', u"An old king's greed has unleashed a plague of evil upon the land, and destiny has chosen you to banish the monsters. The time has come to take up arms and deliver your people from darkness! But beware! As you grow stronger, so will your foes. You'll need every skill and weapon in your arsenal to prevail. Do you have what it takes?", u'\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605', u'\u2713 GORGEOUS graphics!', u'\u2713 Discover a MASSIVE WORLD!', u'\u2713 Find EPIC LOOT!', u'\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605', u'\u2713 TONS of BRUTAL WEAPONS!', u'\u2713 DEVASTATING WEAPON SKILLS!', u'\u2713 DOZENS of QUESTS!', u'\u2713 HORDES of ENEMIES!', u'\u2713 DEEP SKILL SYSTEM!', u'\u2713 INSANE BOSSES!', u'\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605', u'*KNOWN ISSUES*', u'iPhone 3GS: Some text appears blurry and unreadable on 3GS (fix already in the works)', u'iPad 3: Some UI elements are shrunken (update next week will fix this)', u'\u25b6 http://twitter.com/TRINITIgames', u'\u25b6 http://facebook.com/TRINITIgames']

Name: Crow
Description: [u'Kotaku - "Crow Could Be the Greatest iPhone Game I\u2019ve Played"', u'TapByte - "10/10 Sunside Games has managed to create a masterpiece of a game."', u'idow.ru - "5/5 - This is the best game I\'ve ever played on iOS"', u'iFanzine - "4/5 \'Shadow of the Colossus\' for iOS? Yeah, it\'s actually kinda like that!"', u'App-score.com "9/10 One of the most visually stunning games I\'ve seen"', u'Unbound Gamer - "Crow isn\u2019t like any other game I\u2019ve played before, ever"', u'SlideToPlay - "Beautiful environments and an ambitious attempt at storytelling"', u'Gamezebo - "Built using their proprietary Radiance development platform, Crow seems to be as unique as it is visually stunning"', u'What People Are Saying:', u"\u201cI thoroughly enjoyed the game. It offered a very unique and fun experience unlike any other iOS game I've come across.\u201d", u"\u201cI've never see a game like this. The idea of this game is awesome.\u201d", u'\u201cAfter booting it up and watching the opening sequence, I knew I was in for a real treat. It was very well done and the music was superb.\u201d', u'\u201cI definitely had a lot of fun playing the game and would highly recommend it.\u201d', u"\u201cVery unique and unlike any other game on the iPhone that I've come across.\u201d", u"\u201cOutstanding. Definitely some of the best I've seen from an iPhone game and they do a great job at bringing the world to life. The backdrops and scenery were just beautiful to look at.\u201d", u'\u201cIt was a moody but amazing experience. It was hard to put the game down before beating it.\u201d', u'\u201cI think that Crow is an outstanding title with a good strong personality and really original concept. It looks and plays great, controls are smooth and sound immerses you into the game.\u201d', u'***Includes high-resolution support for the new iPad!***', u'Crow is a story-driven action-adventure for iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch. Combining unique exploration, combat, and game mechanics, Crow takes the player on an exciting journey to faraway lands where an ancient battle is unfolding.', u"Created using Sunside's in-house game platform Radiance\u2122, Crow delivers stunning visuals and immersion in a fully 3D world.", u'Your choices will forever alter the course of this world. Will you Curse your foes or Spare them and risk the consequences?', u'* Minimum Requirements: iPhone 3GS and later devices.', u'* Recommended: new iPad, iPad 2, iPhone 4 or 4th Gen iPod Touch']

Name: Star Sloth
Description: [u'Sloth is having a hard time staying awake! Help him keep his job by delivering cheeseburgers to hungry customers throughout the cosmos.', u'Astronomical Features: ', u'\u2022 Travel to the furthest reaches of space via wormholes!', u'\u2022 Built in autopilot randomly generates endless delivery routes.', u'\u2022 Collect credits to unlock new galaxies & items in the shop.', u'\u2022 Instant performance feedback with the Satisfact-O-Meter.', u'\u2022 Stellar art, animation & music.', u'\u2022 Vegitarian friendly with optional veggie burgers.', u'\u2022 Optimized for the new iPad!']

Name: European War 3
Description: [u'67% off for a limited time! ', u'In European War 3 you will be a commander leading your soldiers to fight for resources, promote economic and industrial growth, develop new technology and seize opposing territory. Whenever deploying army, navy or air force, you need to take much thought due to their strength and weakness. Work on your defenses when you are in a weak position; build airport if you need air support. Fighting the battle could earn your forces experience and when they come to Ace Forces, their combat effectiveness would be impressive! It\u2019s also important to upgrade your commander level as you would take the lead. European War 3 also gives you a choice among different modes like Empire, Campaign, Conquest and Multiplayer.', u'Empire Mode: ', u'conquest among 8 empires with 40 campaigns.[British Empire, German Empire, the United States, Japanese Empire, Qing Dynasty, French Empire and Austro-Hungarian Empire]', u'Campaign Mode: ', u'30 actual historical campaigns (choose any force you like)', u'Conquest Mode:', u' choose any country to compete in Asia, Europe and America for hegemony.', u'Multiplayer Mode: ', u'player versus player, available in 1v1, 2v2 or 3v3 format.', u'Features:', u'- 28 command cards make the battle full of change.', u'- 11 forces such as the army, navy and air force all have unique features.', u'- 32 nations are involved across Europe, Asia and America, 1271 administrative regions in total.', u'- Technology reaches up to five levels.', u'- Mini-map display', u'- The map can be zoomed in or zoomed out .', u'- 15 levels of rank promotion (from Private to Field Marshal)', u'- Auto-save']

Name: Kick the Buddy: Second Kick
Description: [u'Kick the Buddy\u2122 returns! The same explosive gameplay times two! Now you have more options, many more fantastic elements, and much more fun. Hit, cut, blow up, burn and play the mini-games. You now have a virtually limitless arsenal: rockets, grenades, automatic rifles, torture instruments\u2026 and even a nuclear bomb.\xa0We present to you Kick the Buddy: Second Kick \u2013 it\u2019s more than just a game!\xa0Want more kicks?', u"Even if you're a relatively stress-free person you need to blow off steam at some point or another. Kick the Buddy is a PERFECT METHOD OF STRESS RELIEF! Choose the face for the Buddy from your Photo Library or just leave him as he is and\u2026do with him whatever you want\xa0and DE-STRESS YOUR DAY!\xa0", u'\xa0', u'Key Features:', u'- Brand NEW colorful graphics! ', u'-\xa0Brand\xa0NEW\xa0physics model! ', u'-\xa0Brand\xa0NEW super cool elements and categories! ', u'-\xa0Brand\xa0NEW wardrobe with fashionable clothes for Buddy! ', u'-\xa0Brand\xa0NEW sound effects.\xa0Now Buddy has his own voice! ', u'-\xa0Brand\xa0NEW decorations!\xa0', u'-\xa0Brand\xa0NEW bank with buddy money! ', u'-\xa0Brand\xa0NEW interesting achievements! ', u"Grab this game to ensure you're never without a way to lower your blood pressure or a perfect tool to kill a few spare minutes!\xa0", u'\xa0', u'Become a Fan of Kick the Buddy on Facebook: ', u'http://www.facebook.com/kickthebuddy', u'\xa0', u'Follow Kick the Buddy on Twitter: ', u'http://twitter.com/KickTheBuddy', u'\xa0', u'Subscribe for Kick the Buddy YouTube channel: ', u'http://www.youtube.com/user/KicktheBuddy', u'\xa0', u'Have any suggestions regarding the new items or ideas for Buddy comments? Include your suggestion in the feedback!']

Name: MonTowers ~Legend of Summoners~
Description: [u'MonTowers, the new evolution of monster-collecting game!!', u'-------------------------------', u'\u25c6 Summon Monsters!', u'-------------------------------', u'- Players will summon the monsters they have captured while attacking the tower.', u'- Players can enjoy tactical combats by combining special abilities that each monster has.', u'- There are 660 types of costumes available for the monsters.', u'-------------------------------', u'\u25c6 Endless Battles in the Tower!', u'-------------------------------', u'- Players can summon monsters they have obtained by fighting in the tower that features 500 levels in total.', u'- Players can capture all monsters that are in the tower.', u'-------------------------------', u'\u25c6 Look for the Opportunity! GachaMon! ', u'-------------------------------', u'- There are special spells that allow the players to summon the monsters they don\u2019t have.', u'- You can obtain your very own monster by using a special monster and the recipe given by GachaMon.', u'-------------------------------', u'\u25c6 Upgrade Your Monsters!', u'-------------------------------', u'When you upgrade your monster, the monster\u2019s costume will change.', u'Another interesting feature of MonTowers! You can obtain the monsters\u2019 pictures and enjoy them through the Gallery.  ', u'-------------------------------', u'\u25c6 Regular Updates for Our Users', u'-------------------------------', u'- Update will be provided every month after the release. Your MonTowers will continue to evolve.', u'\u2605 Supports 4 Languages : English, Japanese, Korean, Chinese', u'\u2605 Please check the compatible model.', u'- System Requirements: iOS that is higher than 4.2 version ', u'- iPhone 3GS, 4, 4S / iPod 3 & 4 Generation', u'\u203b The game can be operated under iPad 1 and 2, but this app has not been adjusted to fit their screen size.']

Name: MacGuffin's Curse
Description: [u'Get addicted to this stunning werewolf comedy puzzle-adventure! \u2605\u2605An incredible 60% LAUNCH SALE - full price is $4.99!\u2605\u2605 Gadget.com - "A near perfect experience for players of all ages." App-Shack (4.5/5) - "Fans of the genre or tongue-in-cheek humor won\u2019t want to pass up." Apple\'n\'Apps (4.5/5) - "One of the best adventure games in the App Store." AppSmile (4.5/5) - "Interesting storyline, tons of levels, simple controls, and cool artwork." Winner of the \'Best Game Writing Award\' at the Freeplay independent Games Festival!', u"When desperate thief Lucas MacGuffin bungles a museum robbery, he finds himself bound to a mysterious ancient amulet. Using its powers to transform between man and wolf, he must sneak and smash his way through a mind-bending series of puzzles, bring down a terrifying criminal mastermind, and hardest of all, convince his daughter it isn't funny to fill the fridge with dog food. With charming hand-drawn art, an eccentric cast of characters and insanely catchy music, players everywhere will be touched by MacGuffin's heartfelt, relatable struggle to stay away from fire hydrants.", u'TRANSFORM FROM HUMAN TO WEREWOLF! Use the dexterity of a human and the brute force of a well-intentioned werewolf! Each character has their own unique skills, which can solve an inventive array of logical challenges in the style of much-loved hit adventure games.', u'QUICK-WITTED COMEDY: Play through a compelling story brimming with humor, personality and heart featuring dialogue straight from the golden age of adventure games.', u'A RICH, COMPELLING WORLD! Explore the surreal nightlife of an ancient carnival city in hi-tech lockdown inhabited by a huge cast of hilarious, well-developed characters, all masterfully created with unique hand-drawn art.', u'FUN, IMMERSIVE SOUNDTRACK - Destined to have you humming - or howling - along!', u"PLENTY OF AWESOME UNLOCKABLE CONTENT: Comics, post-game challenges, Easter Eggs and developers' commentary are all hidden throughout the game, meaning you\u2019ll keep coming back long after the credits roll!", u'INTEGRATED HELP SYSTEM - Task tracking ensures you can focus on enjoying the game free of stress.']

Name: Total War Battles
Description: [u'BUILD, BATTLE AND AVENGE!', u'Specifically developed for touchscreen platforms, Total War Battles: SHOGUN is a new real-time strategy game from the makers of the award-winning Total War series. ', u'Total War Battles delivers quick-fire, tactical combat balanced with intuitive building and unit management. All set in a beautifully illustrated Medieval Japan.', u'1. COMPETE FOR THE SUPREMACY OF MEDIEVAL JAPAN', u'Lead your clan to battle through more than 10 hours of story-driven campaign set in the world of Total War: SHOGUN 2; winner of \u201cBest Strategy Game of 2011\u201d awards from Gamespot, IGN, Gamespy and GameTrailers.', u'2. BUILD YOUR ECONOMY', u'Deploy and manage your bases to generate resources and recruit units including samurai, archers, ninjas and cavalry. Each victory awards XP to spend on building and troop upgrades that could make a decisive difference to your future battles.', u'3. A UNIQUE TAKE ON REAL-TIME BATTLES ', u'Total War Battles introduces a new real-time battle system that feels both familiar and fresh. The hex battle maps allow for natural unit movements and deep strategy. However, as followers of the \u201cBushido\u201d code of conduct, your units can never turn back \u2013 this twist to classic RTS gameplay adds tension and intensity to the action, making each victory even more rewarding.', u'4. DESIGNED FOR TOUCHSCREENS', u'Introducing an interface designed specifically for touchscreens \u2013 drag and drop buildings and troops, swipe across the battle map with a flick, and pinch to zoom in and out.', u'5. 1Vs1 LOCAL MULTIPLAYER', u'Play against a friend in real-time on a single device in three different multiplayer modes.', u'6. STRATEGY FOR ALL', u'Total War fans will naturally enjoy the intense, deep and rewarding action-strategy gameplay, while more casual strategy fans will appreciate the Zen simplicity of the opening tutorial battles, scalable difficulty level and hint system that will soon make them a tactical master.', u'7. UNIVERSAL APP', u"This iOS app is designed to scale its appearance for iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad, which means Total War Battles takes complete advantage of the iOS device that it's installed on.", u'8. NEW FEATURES COMING SOON', u'We will be improving and enriching the Total War Battles experience, so keep your eyes open for more content and new features coming soon!']

Name: Lock 'n' Load
Description: [u"Once upon a time, there was an evil little girl whose goal was to conquer the world\u2026now it\u2019s up to you to grab your gun and save the day.  Get ready to blow some crazed creeps away in Lock 'n' Load, a twin-stick shooter packed to the brim with style and substance. ", u"We are aware that some users are experiencing crash issues at the start of Lock 'n' Load. We are working closely to correct this bug as soon as possible. In the meantime, if you experience this bug - please turn Airplane mode on before starting the game to solve this temporary issue.", u'SERIOUSLY EPIC', u"Lock 'n' Load is one huge game. With 16 massive levels in the main campaign, 9 huge additional levels in the unlockable Call of Minions campaign, plus 6 tough challenge maps, there\u2019s more gameplay here than you can shake a boomstick at! ", u'PACKIN\u2019 HEAT', u'Use a variety of deadly weapons from shotguns to a chainsaw to mow down anything that stands in your way. ', u'KILLER CREEPS', u"With 32 different enemy types to overcome, ranging from zombies to giant pumpkins, Lock 'n' Load offers up a serious challenge", u'IT\u2019S GOT EVERYTHING', u"Great voice acting, awesome visuals, addictive mini-games, enthralling story, insane weapons, deadly enemies\u2014Lock 'n' Load has everything a great shooter needs and then some!", u'For more information or support, please visit www.chillingo.com']

Name: AngerOfStick3
Description: [u'******************** open event *******************', u'10,000$ money will be freely given once downloading this App within 3 days from openning', u'*********************************************************', u'Scenario:', u'You are on a mission to get rid of villains from a different planet.', u'Each planet has different geographical features and types of enemeies, and you will meet even stronger bosses.', u'In this action game, the five main characters must kill all the villains using different combos and weapon.', u'Features:', u'- The five main characters have different combos and various actions, and you can change the character according to the enemy.', u'- You can meet different types of boss and enemies in each planet.', u'- You can enjoy fantastic mood on various maps of seven different planets.', u'- Like in Dragon Ball, many actions like energy beam, combo in the air, continuous attack, weapon, and power glove for level-up were added.', u'- More action frames and biggger character images than before', u'Support Information: ', u'For additional support, please contact: ', u'E-mail : pjh097@gmail.com']

Name: BattleLand?__Warrior vs Monster
Description: [u'Welcome to BATTLELAND! ', u'***Hundreds of hours of exciting game play in single player mode! *** ', u'***Decide your unique strategy and tactics to defeat your enemies! *** ', u'***Fight real players from around the world in arena! *** ', u'Features: ', u'1. Challenge global players in Arena. Keep a close watch on your avengers. ', u'2. Start game with 8 classes, 16 roles, 40 skills and 500+ equipments. ', u'3. There are thousands of strategies but none of them is invincible, find your own way out. ', u'4. Different strategies bring different experiments. Change your character any time and try them all out as you want! ', u'5. 200+ hours game play, 36 trails maps, 100+ monsters and amazing animations! ', u'6. Mercenary market offers thousands of choices! ', u'7. Powerful equipment reinforce/reforge system and skill reset system.', u'8.Challenging Instance Zones in the Trails Tower! Nonstop challenges to the limit!', u'9.Regular updates, aim for excellent experience!']

Name: Bubble Pig
Description: [u'## Top 100 Games in 7 Countries ##', u'As sunset approaches, the SNEAKY FOXES invade the woods in all kinds of shapes...', u'Help Bubble Pig light up the fairy-tale world to keep the foxes away, or he might end up on the menu.', u'* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *', u'WHAT REVIEWERS SAY:', u'- "Rated 5 / 5" -- App App App', u'- "iOS Game Of The Day" -- MacWorld idg.se', u'- "Lots of variety, excellent controls, great sound" -- TA Forums', u'- "This game is absolutely awesome: - great controls - loads of secrets - funny characters" -- User review', u'* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *', u'GAME FEATURES:', u"- 40 LEVELS packed with secrets, food (hey, he's a pig) and bonus items", u'- Classic PLATFORM FUN tailored for touch screen controls', u'- Foxes with no other hobby than finding new ways to catch the pig', u'- Lots of ACHIEVEMENTS to unlock', u"- Donut Games' famous 3-star ranking system: Increased replay value!", u'- Global High Scores: Submit your scores online', u'- Collectors Icon #33', u"- Exclusively available for Apple's devices (iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch)", u'- And so much more...', u'TECH FEATURES:', u'- iPhone Retina / HD support', u'- Game Center support', u'- UNIVERSAL APP (iPad, iPhone, iPod Touch)', u'* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *', u'Enjoy another Donut Games release!']

Name: Rome and Egypt HD Slot Machine
Description: [u'Rome and Egypt', u"The riches of Rome And Egypt have finally come to your favorite mobile device for the first time from WMS Gaming! Hit the Free Spin Bonus and watch as you become as rich as the Emperors of Rome or Pharaohs of Egypt! Now's your chance to visit the Nile Delta and the Coliseum in the hottest WMS Gaming Slot Machine we've ever seen!", u'This slot machine is connected to other slots through a casino interface. From the casino floor you can browse to the other slots. Your bankroll is shared between all the machines. Other slots include: ', u'- Brazilian Beauty - HD Slot Machine ', u'- Fortune Seeker - HD Slot Machine ', u'- Jungle Wild - HD Slot Machine ', u'- Kilauea - HD Slot Machine ', u'- Reels O Dublin - HD Slot Machine ', u'- Shimmer Beauty - HD Slot Machine ', u'If you like playing these slots solo, you might also want to try playing the slots in tournaments! Buy in to tournaments using your earnings from solo play. Then see how many credits you can win in a set number of spins. You will be competing against other players spinning the same slots with the same number of spins. Earn a high score in a tournament and rake in some serious dough! ', u'All our slots are for entertainment purposes only. No real money is wagered, earned or lost. The payout percentages on our slots is higher than slots in actual casinos and you should not expect similar results.']

Name: MARVEL VS. CAPCOM 2
Description: [u'"The game will be available for $4.99,', u'but in celebration of The Avengers theatrical film, act now to take advantage of the special launch price of $2.99 from April 25th until May 6th (PST)!"', u'Wolverine & Iron Man VS. Ryu & Chun-Li!  One of the most popular arcade-fighting games of all time arrives on the App Store for your iOS tablet or mobile device!  Marvel vs. Capcom 2 brings together legendary characters from the Marvel and Capcom franchises to duke it out in an insane, action-packed, tag-team fighting experience. Pit your favorite heroes in dream match-ups thanks to the robust 56-character roster.  With the optimized iOS touchscreen controls, 2-player versus-mode, unlockable secrets and characters, you better buckle up and prepare to be taken for a ride! ', u'\u30fbA full-featured port of one of the best fighting games of all-time', u'\u30fbMarvel vs. Capcom 2 has previously only been enjoyed in arcades and consoles for over a decade. Now enjoyable anywhere, anytime with the iOS version.', u'\u30fbDeep 56 Character Roster Featuring Characters from the Marvel and Capcom franchises', u'\u30fbOne of the largest character rosters in any fighting game to date', u'\u30fbBringing together Marvel\u2019s greatest comic-book heroes and Capcom\u2019s fiercest video-game fighters', u'\u30fbVersus Mode Battles ', u'\u30fbUsers can connect with other iPhone users via Bluetooth and play against each other ', u'\u30fbNew streamlined touchscreen controls optimized for iOS ', u'\u30fbIntroducing the \u201cFlick Button,\u201d a new control feature that streamlines complex inputs', u'The game can be played on any version after iOS 5.0, on iPhone 4, 4S / iPod touch 4th generation/ iPad 2, iPad 3rd generation.  Note: This application will not work on the iPhone 3GS, iPod Touch 3rd generation or earlier, nor the iPad 1st generation.']

Name: Toy Defense
Description: [u"It's time for action!", u"Victory depends on a well-developed strategy in this amazing new TDefense game. Test your courage and skills as a military leader at the height of World War I. Starting as a fighter, don't miss the chance to become a winner!", u'Also available on iPad! Check the App Store!', u'=========== ', u'GAME FEATURES ', u'=========== ', u'- 48 perfectly designed levels', u'- Four historically accurate weapons with 24 upgrades', u'- 16 awards', u'- Nine different enemies', u'- Intense World War I atmosphere', u'- GameCenter and OpenFeint support', u'- Retina Display support', u'- Facebook support', u'============', u'STILL NOT SURE?  Try the free version!', u'============', u'===== ', u'PRESS ', u'===== ', u'"Fresh perspective of the genre." - SimplyCasual', u'"Makes players think!" - Gameidols', u'"A good combination of casual simplicity and classic strategic thinking." - Casuality', u'"Good music and weapon sounds. The developers took their job seriously."  - GamesPrice', u'========== ', u'COMING SOON ', u'========== ', u'More new worlds ', u'More game levels', u'More languages ', u'Endless mode ', u'======== ', u'MORE INFO ', u'======== ', u'http://www.MelestaGames.com ', u'http://www.facebook.com/MelestaGames ', u'http://www.twitter.com/MelestaGames']

Name: Inotia 4 PLUS: Assassin of Berkel
Description: [u'Which side will you choose when the two forces rise again?', u'Inotia saga brought to the next level! \u300aInotia 4: Assassin of Berkel\u300b', u"Appstore's number 1 RPG chronicles of the Inotian continent has returned with more action and thrill that allures you to exciting party gameplays and other journeys.", u"Stride along with Kiyan, the Shadow Tribe's virtuoso, and Eara, the influential Channel of Light, in their fantasy adventure story. ", u'With improved graphics and storyline from the previous series, get indulged in the battles against goblins, orcs, and more!', u'A new hero awaits to be released from his shadows, or not...in the all-new Inotian continent mobile RPG action game!', u'\u2605Download \u2018Inotia4PLUS\u2019 without advertisement and receive 100 Gem bonus (about $4.99) \u2605 ', u'If you previously played the free version, you can load your old data through data backup SAVE/LOAD. Please check the Setting menu!', u'\u2605Supports: English, \ud55c\uad6d\uc5b4, \u65e5\u672c\u8a9e, \u4e2d\u6587\u7b80\u4f53, \u4e2d\u6587\u7e41\u9ad4.', u'\u25a0 Feature Highlights \u25a0', u'- 6 Classes, 90 Skills', u'Choose from 6 classes; Black Knight, Assassin, Warlock, Priest, and Ranger.', u"15 different skills are added to each class. Combine all skills to customize your party's strategy.", u'- Convenient Party System', u'Mercenaries can be recruited to your party anytime and anywhere. ', u"Once all mercenaries are recruited, 20 or more unique 'mercenary skills' will help you along your journey.", u'- One Of The Largest Mobile RPG Maps', u'Dry deserts and freezing snowfields, mysterious forests and dark dungeons...', u'400 maps with various themes to roam through!', u'- A Tragic Destiny and Other Schemes await the Shadow Assassin and the Channel of Light', u'A breathless chase-and-run story where the two heroes meet companions, enemies, and monsters; Be immersed in emotions as the darkness and light contradicts in force...', u'Enjoy a stronger, and better, scenario. ', u'- Exclusive Sub-quests Ready To Be Unraveled', u'Enjoy other sub-quests in each region of the Inotian continent besides the main story.', u'As you accomplish the quests, you will get your hands on some extraordinary items.', u'Listen to stories of each villager and monster to unfold other mysteries.', u'- End of a Story means a Beginning of a New Journey: Infinite Dungeon for Hardcore Players', u'Cleared the whole story? Get ready to start a new one in Infinite Dungeon! ', u'5 different memory layers will relocate you to a battle that was of your past...but different the next time.', u'Fight villains that are even more vicious and smellier than the main story, to become the ultimate master of Inotia!', u'\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500', u'COM2US GAMES ', u'\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500', u'-Derby Days', u'-The World Of Magic', u'-Magic Tree by Com2uS', u'-Homerun Battle 2', u'-Tiny Farm by Com2uS', u'-Slice it!', u'-Tower Defence: Lost Earth', u'-9 Innings: Pro Baseball 2011', u'-Inotia 3: Children of Cania', u'\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500', u'ABOUT COM2US', u'\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500\u2500', u'Follow us!', u'twitter.com/Com2uS', u"Join Com2uS' Fan Page", u'facebook.com/Com2uS', u'Tips and Updates', u'com2us.com']

Name: Polymer
Description: [u'\u2605 \u2605 50% OFF FOR A LIMITED TIME \u2605 \u2605', u'Polymer is a strategic shape-creating game that combines the logic of Rubik\u2019s Cube, the sliding mechanism of Chuzzle, and the creativity of Lego.', u'Slide columns and rows to create never-before-seen shapes!', u'THREE GAME MODES:', u'\u2022 Two Minutes: Casual and fast-paced', u'\u2022 One Polymer: Stress free and thought-provoking', u'\u2022 Bombs: Destroy the endless waves of bombs!', u'FEATURES: ', u'\u2022 Procedurally generated: every game is different!', u'\u2022 Captivating unlock system', u'\u2022 Five unique pieces', u'\u2022 Everything non-cosmetic can be unlocked without in-app purchase!', u'\u2022 Multiple color schemes', u'\u2022 Tweet or save your best polymers', u'\u2022 Game Center leaderboards and achievements', u'____________________', u'"Polymer is an exceedingly clever logic puzzler."', u'\u2014 IGN', u'"Polymer is destined to eat a lot of the hours of thoughtful gamers."', u'\u2014 Touch Arcade', u'"It\u2019s already one of my favorite puzzle games on iOS."', u'\u2014 148 Apps', u'"A fresh and colorful spin on sliding-block puzzles"', u'\u2014 App Advice', u'"Polymer is just like the molecules inside the game. Colourful, packed with a genuine sense of play, and far more than the sum of the parts"', u'\u2014 Gamezebo']

Name: Ski Safari
Description: [u'Welcome to Ski Safari!', u'Ski Safari is where Animals, Avalanches and Action come together to create a new casual gameplay experience.', u'Our deep sleeping hero has to stay ahead of a relentless avalanche that threatens the local mountainsides. Sven, as we like to call him, can use animals to aid his escape from an icey end. Each of the hillside animals have different attributes to make a speedier escape. Penguins glide further, Yetis are tougher, Eagles soar to great heights, each of these can provide useful advantage for Sven. Sometimes on the slopes Sven can find fast Snowmobiles which can ferry multiple animals a maintain a very high top speed.', u"Staying ahead of the avalanche has its advantages and perks. Completing objectives can 'level up' Sven  and increase his score multiplier. Riding animals, performing backflips add to the score and with an increased score multiplier Sven will rocketing up the highscore table with ease."]

Name: Tower of Fortune
Description: [u'---------- Launch Sale ! ----------', u'---------- 50% price off for a limited time ----------', u'Tower of Fortune is a retro-style slot machine/RPG. You play as a retired hero and lived with daughter peacefully. Until one day, an unknown power from the mystic tower took her away. This force the hero to draw the sword again and fight for his daughter.', u'Features', u'- One button gameplay, easy to learn and no tutorial needed', u'- Retro pixel graphics and funny animation', u'- RPG mechanics such as combat, powerful equipment from defeated boss, level up and skill upgrade system, hero transform and much more...', u'- 4 slot machine game: Combat in the tower, Treasure in the chest, Fight the scum family, and Rest in the tavern', u'- Customize your camp with various options such as dungeon scene, cauldron and mystic pet', u'- 39 kind of enemies want to stop you to find the truth', u'- 22 powerful equipment from the ancient god to collect', u'- 39 random combat quest and 12 random tavern quest to challenge', u"- 3 different game ending to discover in first character's storyline", u'- Endless spin and fun!', u'-----------------------------------------------------------', u'YouTube', u'http://www.youtube.com/user/GameStewStudio', u'Gameplay Movie', u'http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eFcrbURiJrI', u'Facebook', u'http://www.facebook.com/TowerofFortune', u'Blog', u'http://gamestewstudio.blogspot.com']

Name: Luxor Evolved HD (Full)
Description: [u'*** To celebrate the launch of "Luxor Evolved HD" all iOS games reduced to $2.99 or less for a limited time only!!! ***', u'DESCRIPTION', u'In an all-new, completely revamped LUXOR Evolved, the chains are faster, the power-ups more awesome, the shooters more stealthy.  In this retro-styled arcade shooter, you\u2019ll experience a faster, more intense LUXOR, unlike any you\u2019ve seen before.  ', u'Harkening back to arcade classics, LUXOR Evolved is action packed with more bonuses and a quickened pace.  The number one marble shooter game offers up excitement, secret levels, and bonus levels to keep the surprises coming and your shooter firing.', u'FEATURES', u'\u2022 60+ levels of all-new fast and furious LUXOR', u'\u2022 Retro, arcade-style art and level design', u'\u2022 20 power-ups', u'\u2022 3 super power-ups that upgrade your Shooter', u'\u2022 Unlockable secret levels', u'\u2022 PLUS! Bonus levels to defeat', u'MORE GREAT GAMES FROM MUMBOJUMBO!!!', u'Search for MumboJumbo on the App Store and the Mac App Store, or visit www.mumbojumbo.com to find more great games from MumboJumbo!!!', u'7 Wonders', u'7 Wonders: Magical Mystery Tour ', u'Chainz Galaxy', u'Glowfish', u'Everyday Genius: SquareLogic', u'Luxor ', u'Luxor: Amun Rising', u'Luxor 2', u'Midnight Mysteries: Salem Witch Trials', u'Midnight Mysteries: Devil on the Mississippi', u'Midnight Mysteries: Haunted Houdini', u'Pickers ', u'Samantha Swift and the Fountains of Fate', u'Unlikely Suspects', u'Find us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/MumboJumboGames', u'Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/MumboJumboGames']

Name: Pandemic 2.5
Description: [u'Be the villain! Eradicate mankind by designing and releasing your own disease on the world in this expanded and refined update to the popular game Pandemic 2.', u'- Select from dozens of symptoms, resistances and unlocked traits when customizing your viral, parasitic or bacterial classed disease.', u'- Adapt to government strategies as countries fight the spread of your disease by researching vaccines, grounding air travel, establishing quarantines, declaring martial law and much more.', u'- Show off the brilliance of your disease to friends with highscores and achievements courtesy of Game Center.', u'(version 1.01 is on its way)']

Name: Hunger Games - Enter the Reaping
Description: [u'*** Can YOU survive the Hunger Games? ***', u'*** Find out RIGHT NOW by downloading "Hunger Games - Enter the Reaping"! ***', u'With this amazing game, you will discover your actual odds of survival in the 73rd Annual Hunger Games!', u'After being selected for the Hunger Games, you will travel to the capitol to answer a series of vital questions that will help determine your actual chance of survival in the games. Top Panem scientists will analyze your responses, and you will receive a personal "Hunger Games Fitness Report".', u'The Hunger Games Fitness Report will detail your strengths as well as weaknesses, and your overall chance of survival will be revealed! You will also discover the best strategies to apply your unique, real life skills to winning the Hunger Games!', u"Take the report to heart, or play the Hunger Games your own way: it's totally up to you!", u'- Just remember:', u'- The reaping is done...you have been chosen...', u'- The only question is:', u'- Will you live, or will you die?', u'"May the odds be ever in your favor..."', u'NOTE: This is an unofficial Hunger Games parody app. It is not endorsed by or affiliated with Suzanne Collins, the Scholastic Group, or Lionsgate Entertainment. All related rights and trademarks are the property of their respective owners. Furthermore, this parody app exists solely for review, criticism, and educational purposes. No copyright violations are intended under the fair use clause.']

Name: Arms Cartel Global
Description: [u'\u2605\u2605Limited Time Only - 50% Discount!\u2605\u2605', u'WITH A FULL FIVE STAR AVERAGE ON THEIR FIRST GAME, PIXEL ADDICTS NOW BRINGS YOU A BRAND NEW TITLE -', u'\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605 ARMS CARTEL GLOBAL \u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605', u'\

Name: My Little Hero
Description: [u'\u2605\u2605\u2605 EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: $0.99 for a LIMITED TIME ONLY \u2605\u2605\u2605', u'Helmet? On. Sword? Got it. Now find the Boogeyman \u2013 Pinky waits to be rescued!', u'Question: What is a boy to do when his best friend is in danger? Answer: Become a Hero. ', u'Visually stunning with top-notch gameplay, this captivating tale unfolds when a boy\u2019s best friend, Pinky, gets kidnapped by the evil Boogeyman. Track down the Boogeyman while venturing through the enchanting worlds of Dark Forests, Muddy Deserts, Mushy Swamps and the ultimate destination - the Boogeyman\u2019s Nest. Solve puzzles, find treasures, and confront all the enemies of your childhood dreams in the hypnotizing beautiful world, just behind the doors of your bedroom closet. ', u'Tips for a Hero: ', u'1. Search for hidden collectibles and defeat the boss enemies. Remember: there is always a solution to every problem.', u'2. No enemy should be left behind: don\u2019t be afraid to ruthlessly hack and slash for buttons. Hang on to your buttons, as you\u2019ll need them! ', u'3. Feeling a little low on energy? There\u2019s nothing that a little sugar can\u2019t fix \u2013 including mending broken hearts.', u'\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025', u'\u25cf 4 gorgeously crafted worlds (with more to come in future updates)', u'\u25cf Upgradable armor and weapons, with additional items to discover ', u'\u25cf 31 individual hidden collectibles', u'\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025', u'Find out more: http://www.wemogames.net', u'Like us? Love us!: http://facebook.com/wemogames', u'Follow us: http://twitter.com/wemogames', u'\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025\u2025']

Name: DreamWorks Dragons: TapDragonDrop
Description: [u'CALLING ALL VIKINGS FOR DRAGON FIRE-BREATHING FUN!', u'------------------------------', u'This is Berk\u2026 where a great storm has struck the Viking village and sheep are now scattered throughout the land! Save the day by using your wits and new Dragon friends to solve puzzles throughout the dangerously funny, sheep-unfriendly world of Berk!', u'Tap, Drag and Drop your Dragon\u2019s powerful abilities to rescue the flock. Use catapults, drawbridges and much more to your advantage as you explore the breath-taking Dragon world. ', u'------------------------------', u'FEATURES:', u'* Play as Toothless and Hiccup!', u'* Explore more than 40 challenging levels from the boundless Dragon world!', u'* Rescue sheep by using a wide variety of items, from catapults and drawbridges to haystacks, boulders, and much more!', u'* Collect scattered Viking treasure to unlock secret hero levels!', u'* Watch out for more Dragons with unique fire-breathing and flying action!', u'------------------------------', u'Check the store for new dragons, new levels, and ', u'other beautiful lands to explore!', u'------------------------------']

Name: Mini Empires
Description: [u'Build your Empire from the Stone Age to a super modern space-faring civilization.  Battle thousands of online players for supremacy of the planet!', u'New in version 1.2: Cluster Bombs, Power Ups, Player vs. Player Tournaments and more! Prepare your empire!!', u"It's year 2073, the Earth is in a terrible state - no food, no resources, chaos everywhere.  You and two friends embark on a journey away from Earth in search of a better life.  You crash land in a distant planet, decide to part ways and challenge each other to survive on your own!", u'Mini Empires Features:', u'* Upgrade military technologies to advance from Stone Age to Wormhole Age', u'* Play online with thousands of other Empire players', u'* Experience awesome Campaigns spanning over 360 battles', u'* Amass vast riches, Wood and Iron resources to build powerful military units', u'* Control dozens of Air, Sea and Land units in turn-based combat', u'Note: Mini Empires is an online game and requires an Internet connection.']

Name: Robbery Bob???
Description: [u'\u272d\u272d\u272d Featured as New and Noteworthy on the App Store \u272d\u272d\u272d', u'\u272d See what the press are saying about Robbery Bob \u272d', u'"This game is genuinely a joy to play and an interesting take on the robbing genre." \u2014 App-Score', u'"Clever, fun, polished and an encouragingly different iOS gaming experience." \u2014 Arcadelife', u'"It\'s good for delivering some moments of legitimate fear of being caught, and the sneaking around feels authentic and tense." \u2014 Gamezebo', u'"Robbery Bob is a brilliant fusion of stealth and 2D excitement." \u2014 AppCroc', u'"If the Grand Theft Auto phenomenon has taught us anything, it\'s that we as a people love theft. Robbery Bob is just one of the many games that fill that demand." \u2014 Polygon', u'Introducing the Man of Steal\u2026', u"Play as Bob, the hapless burglar intent on changing his ways. Unfortunately for Bob, however, he's going to be forced into a few final jobs before he's allowed out of the criminal life.", u'\u2022 SUPER SNEAKY', u'Sneak past security guards, residents and sleeping bulldogs as you recover the loot in each stage. Use your ninja-like skills to hide in some tight squeezes and avoid detection. ', u'\u2022 THERE GOES THE NEIGHBORHOOD ', u'Your sticky-fingered missions will take you through a local neighbourhood, Downtown, and even through some secret labs. Can you get a perfect on every one?', u'\u2022 LOOT YOUR HEART OUT', u'Bob is going to have to pinch everything from secret documents, to old pairs of clothes, to those always hard-to-find TV remotes!', u'\u2022 CRIME IS A FUNNY OLD GAME', u'Get engrossed in the comical storyline featuring hilarious animations, a fun script and a genuinely twisting narrative. ', u'For more information or support, please visit www.chillingo.com']

Name: THE KING OF FIGHTERS-i 2012.
Description: [u'32 playable characters!! Fight against the strongest players from all over  via Wi-Fi Network!! 6 different game modes available in SINGLE MODE to enjoy the game for hours and hours even alone! Simple Commands allow to easily perform any type of combo!', u'The  2D versus fighting game \u201cKOF-i\u201d returns on iPhone / iPod touch with tons of new content like never before!!', u'\u25a0VS BATTLES FROM ALL OVER VIA WI-FI', u'A"RANK VERSUS" Mode, in which your player ranking  changes depending on your number of victories and losses, as well as a  \u201cFRIEND VERSUS\u201d Mode, where your rank is not reflected, are available. ', u'Challenge the strongest players from all over!', u'\u25a0NEW CHARACTERS, NEW TEAMS', u'In addition to the characters from he previous installment, the 4 new \u201cART OF FIGHTING\u201d, \u201cPSYCHO SOLDIER\u201d, \u201cKIM\u201d, and \u201cIKARI\u201d teams (12 new characters), join the cast of "KOF-i\u201d!! You can now create your favorite team from this formidable roster of  32 fighters!', u'\u25a0A SINGLE-PLAYER MODE RICH IN CONTENT', u'6 game modes are available for thousands of hours of enjoyment even when playing alone: \u201cSINGLE BATTLE\u201d for 1-on-1 fights, \u201cTEAM BATTLE\u201d for classic KOF 3-on-3 gameplay, \u201cENDLESS\u201d Mode to defeat as many opponents as possible with one character, "CHALLENGE" Mode to clear trials by fulfilling requirements, the newly introduced "TIME ATTACK" Mode to compete for the best clear times by  winning 10 matches, and \u201cTRAINING\u201d Mode to get accustomed to the Virtual Pad-based controls and practice your combos.', u'\u25a0SIMPLE COMMANDS', u"The Virtual Pad recreates perfectly reproduces KOF\u2019s smooth controls. Even novice players in fighting games will be able to release various Special Moves, Super Special Moves, NEOMAX Super Special Moves, and other complex moves in one touch. With the Simple Commands, you can easily perform many of the game's fancy combos!!", u'*Please refer to "TUTORIAL" Mode for an explanation of  these commands.', u'\u25a0ADDITION OF TONS OF NEW TRADING CARDS, ILLUSTRATIONS, AND OTHER EXTRA CONTENT', u'Plenty of new Trading Cards (that can be acquired by using points earned during gameplay) along with new Illustrations (which can be viewed at any time by fulfilling certain conditions) have been added to this latest release! Moreover, "KOF-i 2012" includes  rough sketches and illustrations that can only be seen here, which fans cannot afford to miss!', u'\u25a0SIMULTANEOUS RELEASE OFADDITIONAL CHARACTERS', u'2 additional characters, \u201cNESTS-Style KYO\u201d and \u201cIORI with the Power of Flames\u201d are available to download! (paid DLC)']

Name: LEGO Harry Potter: Years 5-7
Description: [u'THE BATTLE IS BUILDING! The sequel to the hit video game is now available for the iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad! ', u'Continue the saga of the Boy Who Lived in this spell-binding adventure for wizards and Muggles alike. Experience Harry\u2019s last years at Hogwarts\u2122 and battle Lord Voldemort\u2122 in the ultimate fight between good and evil. The creative LEGO\xae prowess unites with the expansive world of Harry Potter\u2122 to deliver an exciting and rewarding gameplay experience that features lessons, spell-casting, dueling and much more for players of all ages!', u'Follow Harry\u2019s heroic endeavors and encounter new faces, new lessons, new challenges and new spells.', u'Explore new LEGO gameplay settings including Grimmauld Place, the Ministry of Magic, and Godric\u2019s Hollow as well as iconic locations like Diagon Alley and Hogwarts.', u'Build, conjure and explore this multi-faceted LEGO world as you discover your inner wizard! ', u'FEATURES:', u'STUNNING GRAPHICS', u'Enjoy the game with full 3D game play.', u'INTUITIVE TOUCH SCREEN CONTROLS', u'Touch the screen to cast spells and target objects, use the interactive display to change characters and spells simply by touching their icons, and recreate iconic duels by casting and deflecting spells with your fingers tips.', u'LEADER BOARDS', u'Complete the game to 100% in the fastest time and post your scores to the leader board. Compare your score against friends or the whole world!', u'ACHIEVEMENTS', u'25 achievements to unlock ', u'DUELING CLUB EXPANSION', u'Add the Dueling Club expansion and master advanced dueling skills against a host of famous witches and wizards including Professor Snape, Kingsley Shacklebolt, Lord Voldemort and many more. Defeat each category leader to unlock them for use in Free Play mode.']

Name: Brainsss
Description: [u'Breakthrough new mobile game where YOU play as the zombie swarm, rounding up mankind to join your side. ', u"TouchArcade 4.5 out of 5  \U0001f31f's!", u"iFanzine.com 4.5 out of 5  \U0001f31f's!", u'"It\'s a beautifully implemented squad-based title" - iFanzine.com', u'"Brainsss is an easy-to-play zombie game that must go down as the one of the most intellegent iOS zombie game so far." - best10apps.com', u'"Vibrant, loveable aesthetic." - gamezebo.com', u'"Brainsss is not your typical zombie game, in fact it is far from that." - approc.com', u'"Engaging mixture of strategy and tactile play." - gamezebo.com', u'"If you\'re a fan of strategy games or zombies, give Brainsss a try." - appadvice.com', u'Control multiple groups of zombies and guide them to victory with touch controls. Trap, chase, intimidate, and ultimately, convert those annoying humans. ', u'Build a massive swarm of zombies and trash the human defenses. Careful some of the humans will fight back! ', u'Play through lots of amazing, beautiful levels that include suburbia, hospitals, parks, airports, cities, and offices, to name a few. ', u'Use your cunning, strategy, and on the fly decision making to catch them all! ', u'***iPod Touch 3rd Gen or earlier is not supported', u'***iPhone 3G or earlier is not supported', u'*70+ achievements', u'*Universal app - 1 purchase for all your devices', u'*Free new levels released each week!', u'*Supports iPad 3 retina display', u'*Left Handed support']

Name: Snabbit
Description: [u'#1 Arcade game (full version)  in app store! \u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605 average rating!', u'50% OFF FOR A VERY LIMITED TIME. The Snabbit is star-hungry\u2026', u'Guide the star-craving Snabbit through murky asteroid belts while hunting cosmic treasure\u2026', u'This is a fast reaction arcade game that will test your thumb-wit to the max!\xa0\u2028', u'\u2022 Guide the Snabbit through three huge level packs!\u2028', u'\u2022 Play the endless survival mode against your friends!', u'\u2028\u2022 Create and share your own levels, right on your iPad/iPhone/iPod!', u"\u2028\u2022 Enter The Makers Tournament, and win 1% of Snabbit's revenue!\u2028", u'----------------------------------------------\xa0', u'THE MAKERS TOURNAMENT', u'In addition to playing lots of awesome in-game levels, you can create your own and share them with the world! The greatest level-maker is rewarded with 1% of Snabbit\u2019s revenue from the first day until forever. Read more on www.snabbits.com']

Name: Tap Creepy Manor
Description: [u'Build a Creepy Manor full of kooky residents and their pets, and the spooky ghosts that haunt them!', u"Get 15 FREE CRYSTALS when you purchase this app for $0.99!! That's 50 % EXTRA!!", u'PLEASE NOTE: this game lets you purchase items within the game for real money. \xa0Please disable in-app-purchases on your device if you do not want this feature to be accessible.', u'-----------------------------------------------', u'LOTS OF AWESOME FEATURES!', u'- Many different rooms to choose from, in various themes, shapes and sizes!', u'- More than 25 different residents, from creepy guests to wacky GHOSTS!', u'- When you\u2019re not looking, FLOATING GHOSTS appear in your manor! Tap the FLOATING GHOSTS for FREE COINS!', u'- Get Groomers to get your residents WACKY pets fit for a creepy manor!', u'- Build PRANK ROOMS so residents and ghosts can trick each other in this SPOOKY MANOR!', u'- Unlock new rooms and residents at every new level!', u'- Hire kooky STAFF to give you a helping hand in returning your creepy manor to its former glory!', u'- Decorate the outside of your Mansion to give it the perfect level of creepiness!', u'- Use connectors to create mansions with creative and customized layouts!', u'- Collect money from your residents and use it to build an even better manor!', u'- Visit your creepy neighbors!', u'- Works on the iPod Touch, all iPhones and the iPad.', u'Note: this is an online game and IPod touch users must be connected to WiFi.']

Name: Empire Defense II
Description: [u'Command your army, design your own defense way and become a hero in Empire age!', u'Millions of players\u2019 decision! \u2019Empire Defense II\u2019 is coming in May,2012.', u'+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++', u'Download & get 20,000 crystals', u'+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++', u'REVIEWS:', u'- Cody: Very fun game, very well thought out. ', u'- MaticElcecticElectric: A solid TD game with an interesting twist of being able to develop the path the enemy follows over time, and some nice RPG style elements like heros with inventories\u2026\u2026', u'- Ervin Joseph: BEST GAMES! It is best improve games because of new update of hero, solider, items are unique but you can more update about hero name from Legend of three empire: Xun You, Li Dian, Sun Quan, Xu Chu, Mi Zhu, Liu Feng, Wei Yan, Cheng Z, Jin X, Zhao Yu, Bao London, etc.', u'- Danny : Truth. great game. but may be hard to download. i got lucky. overall great game based on ancient chinese history. around 150 to 220 ad. you play has the shu kingdom.', u"- Johninnit: Great. Best defence/strategy game I've come across - some real character, and since later updates it's way more stable too. would like to see a paid version without ads, but that's hopefully in the pipeline.", u'+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++', u'TONS OF AWESOME FEATURES:', u'- Three heroes with their own skills and characteristics is available.', u'- Plan your defense way by moving the hero. Then the enemy will launch along with your way.', u'- Groups of different soldiers to fight in the battle. Soldiers have their own strengths. The key to victory is the good co-ordination.', u'- The points, designed in high degree of freedom, display the most individual clearance!', u'- Witness the growth of Liubei and other heroes, adventure and fight with them, break through the heavy fog to reveal the ultimate mystery!', u'+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++', u'\u25c6 SEE THE EPIC EMPIRE DEFENSE II TRAILER', u'http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-aORmoKNbVQ&feature=youtu.be', u'\u25c6 VISIT OUR FACEBOOK', u'http://www.facebook.com/GoodTeamStudio', u'\u25c6 SUPPORT EMAIL', u'service@gts8.com', u'NOTES', u'- Works great on iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad']

Name: Kingdom Story XD
Description: [u'\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605 Big Sale! Download now! Thanks for supporting us!', u'\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605 You will receive 20 Gems.', u'\u201cSo many monsters to fight, this is great!\u201d', u'\u201cSo much to do, never a dull moment!\u201d', u'\u201cLove the great graphics and animations!\u201d', u'Receive 20 FREE Gems on first time login!', u'Kingdom Story, a mixed style role-playing, simulation and strategy game, takes place during a time of magic. In this mythical Kingdom world, you are a lord battling monsters, magical creatures, evil mages and wicked wizards all in the hope of building a powerful and prosperous kingdom for your subjects. But beware, there are always powerful evil lords and other competing Kingdoms that want to prevent your ascension so it is essential that you forge a powerful army with great Generals.', u'Features:', u'- Build your city in so many ways!', u'- Many Generals and soldiers to choose from!', u'- Forge powerful weapons and gears for your Generals!', u'- Tons of evil monsters to fight!', u'- Rich graphics, great sounds and animations!', u'- Simple interfaces for easy control of your expanding city']

Name: Monster Shooter: The Lost Levels
Description: [u'More levels, more enemies, more weapons... GET THE BEST MONSTER SHOOTER EVER - NOW!', u'\u2737\u2737\u2737 Discount 66%\xa0until\xa0May 14th only! \u2737\u2737\u2737', u'Monster Shooter: The Lost Levels is the totally ad-free premium edition of possibly the best mobile dual-stick shooter game ever, with brand new exclusive features and content!', u'Survive massive waves of enemies and save the kitten. Find all you need to annihilate aliens in fully packed armory. Upgrade your weapons for even greater destruction. Improve your play style with perks and support items. Challenge your friends to beat your high-score in Survival Mode. This and much more will guarantee long hours of the most exciting gameplay you can get on your mobile!', u'HIGHLIGHTS:', u'- New levels, new enemies, new weapons!', u'- 60 challenging levels on 3 different planets', u'- 12 upgradeable weapons', u'- Over 80 Game Center achievements', u'- Game Center leaderboards in survival mode', u'- Over 100 missions', u'- Ultra-cute hand-drawn 2D graphics', u'- Stunning visual and audio effects', u'---', u'Remember to join our Fan Page on Facebook for the latest updates on our games, previews and hints:', u'facebook.com/gamelion ', u"If you're on Twitter, follow us on:", u'twitter.com/gamelion ', u'Contact us via email: ', u'support@game-lion.com']

Name: Wingsuit Stickman
Description: [u"Did you ever dream of flying down the highest mountains in the world? Now it's your time, join the Wingsuit Stickman experience, pack your wingsuit and glide through beautiful landscapes, cross the Alps, fly down the Rocky Mountains or enter a deadly volcano while performing insane stunts, scaring birds and plane pilots and simply enjoy the wonderful experience of a perfect wingsuit proximity flight. ", u'\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605 Regular content updates with new and amazing levels coming every few weeks! The first update with a new free level is already finished and will be submitted today \u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605', u"\u2605 From the makers of various top 100 apps like Stick Stunt Biker, Line Runner, Line Birds, Rope'n'Fly, Line Surfer,\xa0RunStickRun and more", u'\u2605 Wingsuit Stickman is in the top 100 overall in various countries including Australia, Austria, Germany, Italy, France, UK, US, etc..', u'FEATURES:', u'\u2022 Includes more than 20 beautiful designed levels from "Relaxed gliding" to "Jump into a deadly volcano"', u'\u2022 Full animated physic rag doll', u'\u2022 Amazing Retina Graphics', u'\u2022 Complete physics enabled', u'\u2022 Various obstacles like Planes, Birds, Wind wheels, Waters, Volcanos, and even Transylvanian death wasps', u'\u2022 Perform cool stunts to earn extra bonus', u'\u2022 Different environments', u'\u2022 Agil and fast reacting wingsuit experience using accelerometer technology', u'\u2022 Achievements', u'\u2022 Online and Offline leaderboard', u'\u2022 Game Center and Openfeint enabled', u'\u2022 World ranking displayed in game after each race finished', u'\u2022 Directly compare yourself against all other players or your friends', u'\u2022 and many more...', u'All levels can of course be played for free, the optional in-app purchases just allows you to play them immediately instead of having to progress through the game.', u'\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605 Update submitted for review \u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605', u'Thank you for your initial feedback.
