Name: Matching Cheats - for Matching With Friends
Description: [u'Matching Cheats is the ultimate Matching With Friends companion, guaranteed to make you a better player and more formidable opponent. Matching Cheats will show you all the top scoring solutions that can be created. With one tap, Matching Cheats will show you how to find the best tile placement on a Matching With Friends board.', u'Use the import feature to upload a screenshot of your Matching With Friends game and Matching Cheats will calculate all the top playable solutions available. Matching Cheats also has a quick import feature to import your last screenshot taken immediately.', u'Features:', u'\u2022 Shows top playable solutions for rack tiles', u'\u2022 Import Matching With Friends screenshots', u'\u2022 One tap import using Quick Import', u'\u2022 One tap "Back to game" button', u'Matching Cheats and Pinc Studios are in no way affiliated with Matching With Friends, Zynga or any other application mentioned within Matching Cheats.']

Name: Trainz Driver - train driving game and realistic railroad simulator
Description: [u'The #1 Ranked "Trainz Simulator" iPad app has now been customized for iPhone. Trainz Driver really delivers the goods!', u"It's time to pack more horsepower in your pocket and take Trainz Driver with you everywhere you go. With a new user interface, controls, and a mix of realistic routes and arcade style sessions, there is something for everyone with Trainz Driver.", u'Trainz Driver puts you in the cab of a variety of locomotives from around the world. Choose from the "Easy Mode" speed controls, or the more advanced "Realistic Mode" control system. With multiple camera modes you can fly alongside your favourite train, admire the view from the cab, or watch from trackside all while you interact with industries and passenger stations, picking up and dropping off freight wagons, people,  and more!', u'Expand your experience: You can also create your own Routes and Sessions in Trainz Simulator for iPad (available for separate purchase on the App Store) and then share them with Trainz Driver users through the Download Station. Hundreds of user-created routes are already available, free to download.']

Name: JUSTICE LEAGUE : Earth's Final Defense
Description: [u'"JUSTICE LEAGUE : Earth\u2019s Final Defense"', u'The all-time DC Super Heroes are in one game!', u'DC comics\u2019 5 super heroes-Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, Green Lantern, and Flash-are standing together against Luther and the Villain. ', u'\u2605\u2605\u2605 Launching Promotion \u2605\u2605\u2605', u'You can have a chance to get JL with $2.99 only for 7 days.', u'Enjoy playing Justice League~~~', u'\u2605\u2605\u2605 It\u2019s 3D Action Game \u2605\u2605\u2605', u'When you play JUSTICE LEAGUE: Earth\u2019s Final Defense, you can have 3D action experience controlling JUSTICE LEAGUE Heroes in New52 styled suit.', u'\u2605\u2605\u2605 Justice League Heroes \u2605\u2605\u2605', u'\u25a0 You can play 5 heroes: Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, Green Lantern, and Flash.', u'\u25a0 Stop the evil forces through 4 chapters and 20 episodes among 3 difficulty levels', u'\u25a0 The heroes throw away and pursuit the enemies with combo action.', u'\u2605\u2605\u2605 The ability and Development of the Heroes \u2605\u2605\u2605', u'\u25a0 With level up and stat point system, your heroes can be more powerful.', u'\u25a0 Each hero has 12 skills. You can upgrade and use the special skills.', u'\u25a0 From classic to the New 52 costumes are available and each hero has 5 suits which gives them more power.', u'\u2605\u2605\u2605 Powerful Teammates \u2605\u2605\u2605', u'\u25a0 The Cyborg appears and helps to the JLA members each event.', u'\u25a0 30 JLA teammates will help you through Support Cards System.', u'\u25a0 Get all the teammates cards - awesome illustrations and great support powers.', u'\u2605\u2605\u2605 Rich Contents \u2605\u2605\u2605', u'\u25a0 You will have your mission in Metropolis, Gotham City, Watch Tower, Hall of Doom and the other fictional places.', u'\u25a0 You have to fight all the evil forces: Luthor, Joker, Killer Croc, Ares, Sinestro, Gorilla Grodd, etc.', u'\u25a0 Your rank and reward depend upon the battle, combo and the clear time score.', u'\u25a0 You will experience Superman\u2019s Freezing Breath, Batman\u2019s Bat Swarm, Flash\u2019s Speed Force, and other amazing skills.', u'\u25a0 You can collect 30 support hero cards and view the cool illustrations in full screen.', u"\u2605\u2605\u2605 JUSTICE LEAGUE: Earth's Final \u2605\u2605\u2605", u'Defense only compatible with iPhone4, iPhone4S, iPod Touch(4th generation), iPad 2 and iPad(3rd generation) Reauires iOS 4.0 or later.', u'\u2605\u2605\u2605 Important Notice \u2605\u2605\u2605', u'This app will not run on jailbreak idevice.If you jailbroke, undo it before you buy this app.', u'*** More Info ***', u'Visit our official site at https://mobile.netmarble.net', u'Check out our videos and game trailers on  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e1BDkX0RKnI&feature=player_detailpage', u'Customer Service : netmarbles@cjig.net']

Name: The Infinity Project 2
Description: [u'Weekend Launch sale! Get The Infinity Project 2 for 66% off, now through Sunday, August 5th.', u'Check out our website for awesome info about awesome stuff (wink, wink, nudge, nudge)!', u'Stop the evil Talon High Commander from destroying Earth and enslaving mankind. ', u'The Infinity Project 2 is a new kind of First Person Shooter game with elements of free roam and linear gameplay blended to create a deep and interactive story.', u'An evil alien race called the Talon\u2019s have time traveled from the year 2243 to sometime in Earth\u2019s past and drastically changed Human history. You must follow them and investigate when this happened to try to stop them. Along the way you find out humans may not be the innocent victims in this galactic battle for survival!', u'The Infinity Project 2 is a sci-fi First Person Shooter putting your skills to the test.', u'Fight through different environments and times, battle your friends online with Game Center or Local WiFi and Bluetooth, or try your skill with 10 levels of survival mode. Post your high scores and achievements to Facebook and Twitter!', u'Start out in the year 2243 on The Infinity Station, a top secret research space station that houses The Infinity Project, a device capable of transporting objects anywhere in time and space. Choose from 4 Human Augmentation Suits, each with it\u2019s own enhanced capability, then collect your weapons from the armory. Then get transported back to earth in the year 2012 to find history changed. Talk with the locals to find out what happened and track down the evil Talon High Commander to stop him from changing Earth\u2019s history. You will then be thrown into a battle for survival not only for yourself, but for all of mankind that spans thousands of years.  Stop the invasion of Earth before all is lost.', u'The Infinity Project 2 features 3 game modes full of action.', u'1) Campaign Mode: an exciting campaign and engaging story.', u'   - Choose from 8 characters to play and 4 specialty enhanced Human Augmentation Suits (HAS) each with its own special ability.', u'   - Explore and fight through a Post Apocalyptic earth, alien space ship, destroyed space station and more, all with astounding visuals.', u'   - Search for and use unique perks to temporarily enhance your HAS Suit abilities such as run faster, cloak, shields, and more.', u'   - Earn experience points and trophies to compare with your friends on Game Center.', u'   - Earn additional trophies and perks by completing side-missions.', u'   - Investigate how Earth\u2019s history was changed and battle through different times that span thousands of years!', u'2) Survival Mode: 10 un-lockable survival levels.', u'   - Battle countless waves of enemies to see how long you can survive while gaining credits to spend in the armory to buy perks, more ammo, different weapons, and better armor. ', u'   - Earn experience points to compare with your friends on Game Center.', u'   - Un-lock levels as you increase in experience. ', u'3) Multiplayer: battle your friends with 5 levels of multiplayer fun.', u'   - Increase in rank as you gain experience to unlock perks and better armor.', u'   - Battle up to 4 players on Game Center and 6 players with local/bluetooth.', u'   - Compare experience points with your friends on Game Center.', u'FEATURES:', u'- Choose from 8 characters to play (11 for multiplayer)', u'- Long and engaging campaign', u'- Survival mode with 10 un-lockable levels', u'- Game Center Achievements', u'- Online Leaderboards', u'- Game Center and local multiplayer featuring 5 maps', u'- Multiple Skill Levels', u'- Choose between 3 control schemes', u'- Enhanced special effects for iPhone 4s and up, and iPad 2 and up', u'NOTE to iPod Touch 3rd Gen users:', u'The Infinity Project 2 may not run on this device due to large memory requirements.', u'Visit our webpage for more screenshots, videos, updates, and announcements! www.crazyrobotgames.com', u'Join our Facebook page for updates and announcements!', u'https://www.facebook.com/pages/Crazy-Robot-Games/250789015542']

Name: San Juan
Description: [u'\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605 The exciting card game based on the award-winning strategy game Puerto Rico is now available for iPad and iPhone \u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605\u2605', u'The exciting card game based on the award-winning board game Puerto Rico is finally available for your iDevice. Experience the Spanish colonisation once again with San Juan.', u'Puerto Rico is at its prime. But can the same be said of this beautiful island\u2019s capital city? Take on the role of the governor, builder, producer, trader or councilor and bring the city wealth and prestige. Are you smart enough to build the most profitable production facilities? Can you outdo your competitors with the most important buildings? Each building, whether a palace, poorhouse, smithy or silver smelter have their advantages. Who will finally win the battle for supremacy in San Juan?', u'Features: ', u'\u25ba Digital adaptation of the card game based on Puerto Rico.', u'\u25ba Designed by Andreas Seyfarth.', u'\u25ba Stand-alone game, can be played without having played Puerto Rico.', u'\u25ba Interactive tutorial to make San Juan easier to play.', u'\u25ba Full Retina support on iPhone and iPad.', u'\u25ba Play with up to three other players or computer opponents on one iDevice, or play online with players from all over the world via Game Center. ', u'\u25ba Discover new tactics and ways to become the ruler of San Juan!', u'\u25ba No need to assemble: simply start the game to enter the colonial world! And best of all: no need to put away the game once you have finished playing.', u'\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac\u25ac', u'Feel free to check out Ravensburger\u2019s other games, including Scotland Yard, THE aMAZEing Labyrinth and Puerto Rico, along with many, many others.', u'Become a fan of Ravensburger Digital on Facebook and find out more about our new apps, exclusive competitions and behind the scenes information about the development of our apps:', u'http://www.facebook.com/RavensburgerDigitalGmbH ']

Description: [u'\u201cOnce again, Adult Swim delivers with a miniature mobile masterpiece.\u201d -GameTrailers.com ', u"\u201cYou won't play a more experimental, risky, fun and flamboyant endless-runner this year.\u201d -Modojo.com ", u"Burrow out of the Big House wit

Name: Mad Skills BMX
Description: [u'CLEAR YOUR SCHEDULE: MAD SKILLS BMX IS OUT!', u'The makers of the most addictive racing game ever made, Mad Skills Motocross, have done it again. Apologize now to your girlfriend, boyfriend, wife or husband for all the time you\u2019re about to spend on the best BMX racing arcade game of all time.', u'Features', u'RACE 40 CHALLENGING TRACKS AND MORE TO COME!', u'Beating Mad Skills BMX is no easy feat. To do so, you\u2019ll need to be on your game through 40 rad levels in four different classes: Novice, Intermediate, Expert and Pro. Pedal, pump and flip your way through insane tracks as you find new lines to shave off precious seconds and improve your times. The more you play, the faster you get.', u'UNBELIEVABLE PHYSICS AND INNOVATIVE NEW CONTROLS!', u'Based on real BMX racing, the physics of Mad Skills BMX will blow your mind. Realism and arcade action combine for a completely unique experience. And innovative swipe controls make the game easy to control for beginners but a challenge to master for high-level gamers. You\u2019ve never played a game like this before.', u'COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS!', u'Connect to Facebook to race against your friends\u2019 best times on every track, to watch replays of their times, and to fight your way up the leaderboards. And we\u2019ll be adding more ways to connect with friends soon! Social gaming has never been so fun.', u'CHANGE YOUR CHARACTER!', u'Choose to race with a number of included characters, from the realistic to the fantastic. And if you\u2019re one of the best in the world, you\u2019ll earn an exclusive skin that even money can\u2019t buy.', u'MUSIC BY STRUNG OUT!', u'Rock out to an awesome soundtrack by legendary punk band Strung Out, or race to your own music.', u'AND MORE!', u'\u2713 Interactive tutorial to learn how to shred.', u'\u2713 TONS OF UPDATES TO COME, including new track packs and rider skins (both free and IAP), Game Center achievements, more ways to connect with friends for social play, and much more. We update like crazy!', u'\u2713 Universal application: Buy it once and play it on all of your compatible iOS devices', u'\u2713 Beautiful retina-optimized graphics for an amazing gameplay experience.', u'See the official trailer here: http://www.madskillsbmx.com/trailer', u'Like Mad Skills BMX at www.facebook.com/madskillsbmx', u'Follow Mad Skills BMX at www.twitter.com/madskillsbmx', u'Gift this app! Just click the arrow beside the Buy App icon.', u'Don\u2019t miss Mad Skills Motocross, perhaps the most addictive game ever made for iOS!']

Name: Jack Lumber
Description: [u'**THREE DAY LAUNCH PRICE PROMOTION FROM 8/16 - 8/18! **', u'We\'re chopping the price for "tree days" to help Jack Lumber turn the forest into sawdust and avenge his Granny.', u'_______________________', u'Use the supernatural powers of Jack Lumber to massacre the forest and make Granny proud in this time-warping line-drawing log-slicing pun-filled lumberjacking mashup.', u'Jack Lumber is \u2018Poplar\u2019 With the Press!', u'\u2026.A fresh feel of it\u2019s own...', u'-MacLife', u'Thinking Man\u2019s Fruit Ninja with anti-tree themes!', u'-Giant Bomb', u'Super fun, totally dig it.', u'-The Escapist', u'Ridiculous, absurd, and silly only begin to describe Jack Lumber, but ultimately, and most importantly, the game is a ton of fun to play.', u'-BitMob', u'Bottom line: I really am sold...Jack Lumber is a winner.', u'-Kotaku', u'A LUMBERJACK WITH AN AXE TO GRIND', u'A tree killed his granny and now he is out for revenge. Meet Jack Lumber, the superhuman lumberjack who hates trees, loves animals, and hates trees. Did we say that twice? The guy really hates trees.', u'Hike the trails of Flapjack Forest, trudge through The Loggers Bog, and ascend Widowmaker\u2019s Peak chopping down every pine, oak, and maple that stands between you and the tree that killed your sweet old granny.', u"SHOW 'EM WHO'S BOSS", u'With one mighty swing of his axe, Jack Lumber sends logs, syrup bottles, explosives, and forest critters flying into the air.  ', u'Use magic powers to enter LumberTime. With the logs suspended in slow motion, draw a smooth path for Jack\u2019s axe following the grain of every treacherous log.', u'Poke at the adorable forest animals living rent-free in your cabin after you\u2019ve destroyed their homes', u'Raid Granny\u2019s Cupboard!', u' - Drink Granny\u2019s magical syrups to enhance your powers.', u' - Intensify the gameplay by equipping challenging new beards', u' - Spruce up the old cabin with tasteful lumber-decor!', u' - Turn the forest into sawdust with the finesse and grace that only a burly lumberjack can possess.  But be careful not to harm your furry friends.', u'Every level requires timing, skill, logic, and flannel  to solve. (Flannel wear not actually required) Unlockable missions, player driven challenges, and inventive power-up combos make it exciting to play this game again and again.', u'OTHER FEATURES:', u'- Universal support', u'- GameCenter Leaderboards and Achievements', u'- Optimized for retina displays and the New iPad', u'- Social features (seamless Twitter/Facebook integration)', u'We hope you enjoy SEGA Alliance\u2019s debut game, courtesy of the scientists at Owlchemy Labs!', u'Fight the forest and MAKE GRANNY PROUD!', u'______________________', u'Check out other games from Owlchemy Labs:', u'Snuggle Truck', u'AaaaaAAaaaAAAaaAAAAaAAAAA!!! (Force = Mass x Acceleration)', u'Check out other games from SEGA:', u'Sonic & SEGA All-Stars Racing', u'Super Monkey Ball 2: Sakura Edition', u'Sonic The Hedgehog 4 Episode I & II', u'Virtua Tennis Challenge']

Name: Horn???
Description: [u'**IGN-\u201c Horn is this year\u2019s most impressive iOS game\u201d**', u'**AOL- \u201cHorn is a testament to what is possible on mobile\u201d**', u'**GAMEZEBO-\u201c A mobile masterpiece\u201d**', u'**MODOJO-\u201c The newest addiction of any iOS supporter\u201d**', u'**METACRITIC 94 out of 100**', u'**IGN - 9 out of 10-Editor\u2019s Choice**', u'**SLIDE TO PLAY - 4 out of 4**', u'**GAMEZEBO - 5 out of 5**', u'**MODOJO 4.5 out of 5**', u'____________________________________', u'HORN is a 3rd person action adventure game - a completely unique experience where anyone can fully explore and enjoy a beautiful and engaging console-style world, all controllable by touch gestures.', u"You play as a young blacksmith's apprentice named Horn who wakes up to find your village and lands over run by large fantastic, and sometimes humorous, monsters.  It is revealed these creatures are actually the people and animals from your village transformed by a curse, and you alone have the power to free them. On your incredible adventure you carry the loud-mouthed head of one such fantastic creature with you - a somewhat uncooperative and ill-tempered but grudgingly helpful sidekick.  Along with this new companion you must use your sword, crossbow, trusty musical horn, and wits to explore the lands, defeat the enemies, and solve puzzles in your quest to undo the curse that engulfs your homeland.", u'Horn features:', u'\u2217 Accessible controls that anyone can use- walking, jumping, crawling, even grapple hook, are all performed with intuitive gestures', u'\u2217 Freely navigable console-quality detailed world- go wherever you want; not confined to limited path or rail', u'\u2217 A rich and unique fantasy world ', u'\u2217 Touch-friendly melee combat and crossbow style weapons', u'\u2217 3 unique and beautiful lands to discover', u'\u2217 Endlessly escalating challenge modes', u'\u2217 Hidden side content to discover', u'\u2217 Score written by award winning Austin Wintory and performed with full live orchestral ', u'__________________________________________', u'Optimized for iPhone 4S, iPad 2 and new iPad \u2013 includes high-definition graphics and advanced features', u'PLEASE NOTE: iPad (1st Generation), iPhone 3GS, iPod touch devices NOT SUPPPORTED.', u'Localized in French, Italian, German, Latin & European Spanish, Korean, and Simplified Chinese.  Coming shortly in Brazilian Portuguese, Polish, Russian, and Japanese.']

Name: Random Heroes
Description: [u"From the creators of the award winning platform game League of Evil comes Ravenous Games' new action platformer Random Heroes!!", u'SUMMARY', u'A group of unlikely heroes are set out to save the world. Monsters from another dimension are trying to take over Earth. Blast your way through these invaders in this action platformer! Collect coins and upgrade your weapons and characters to become stronger, faster and more lethal!', u'Choose your hero and save the world!', u'FEATURES', u'- Over 30 Levels', u'- 15 Characters', u'- 10 Weapons', u'- GameCenter Achievements', u'- Universal and retina enabled', u'- iCloud Save Game', u'DEVICE COMPATIBILITY', u'Random Heroes will only run on iPhone 3GS, iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPad, iPad 2, the New iPad, iPod Touch 3, or iPod Touch 4. Requires iOS 3.1 or later.']
